    "name": "Primes of the form x^2 + y^2 + z, where x, y and z are three successive numbers.",
    "comment": [
        "Equivalently, primes of the form 2n^2 + 3n + 3, generated by the n in A096689."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Vincenzo Librandi, <a href=\"/A095697/b095697.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "f[n_]:=n^2+(n+1)^2+(n+2); lst={};Do[p=f[n];If[PrimeQ[p],AppendTo[lst,p]],{n,0,6!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 04 2009 *)",
        "Select[Table[2*n^2+3*n+3,{n,0,2000}],PrimeQ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 17 2012 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [a: n in [0..300] | IsPrime(a) where a is 2*n^2 + 3*n + 3]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 17 2012"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A096690, A096691."
    ],
